name: I wanna play a space shooter!!
name_original: I wanna play a space shooter!!
description:
My first game!! 

This was meant initially as a little test just playing around with Pico-8 and refreshing some of my coding knowledge, and I decided to expand it into a very small contained game. It was a learning process! I don't intend to expand on this game as space shooters aren't really my thing - it just seemed a simple place to start. I set a goal to make something and achieved it. Expect better things in the future :)

Please marvel and be amazed at:

-Over 2 types of enemies! a final boss even!

The Pizza Boys!

The Exploding Hamburger Boys (Not barrel boys!!)

Pizza Jr.!

Pizza Sr.!!

And also our protagonist Mavery!! =^.^=

-5 levels I believe!!

-5 exciting minutes of gameplay maybe more if you die a lot or less if you stop playing! Whose counting??

-Deafening Silence! Who needs sound effects?? Make the noises yourself! Performance art?

-The first ever boss to have two shooty hands you have to destroy first before you can damage it!

-Absolutely no attack telegraphing!

-Dangerously unbalanced difficulty spikes due to RNG~!

-A shield mechanic! You can shield up to three hits! It only restores when empty!! tough luck pal!! Laser attacks cut right through it! Please be careful, I worry about you!

-4 entire health points! Iframes! restore health every 1000 points! go get em!!

-3 powerups! The Pepper makes you invincible! The Cool Sunglasses give you triple shot! The Party Hat gives you 250% extra damage and rainbow colors! 

-Progressively more annoying mini boss each level!

-Jaw dropping spaghetti code, probably including entire functions that don't do a thing! What do I care? Nerd!! Oh my god please don't look at it!!

-I will probably fix bugs if asked!
